content: this is not a design this is a recipe there is now a group for this pattern and its siblings friends group 1 i don t really like the wedge shape of most of the toe-up sock toes that i ve come across so i played around and came-up with this it works for me so i hope it works for you any and all feedback welcome lynne xx 1 http //www ravelry com/groups/friends-of-the-28-row-scarf-and-its-siblings
